1.content:
Hello Operative.

We have numerous missions for you to go on. All of them are vital to our operations.

Now, which mission will you go on?
1.title: What Mission?

11.content:
Werewolf
Operative's
Life's
Furry

*Ring! Ring! Beep! Beep! Ring! Beep!*

"Five more minutes," Numbuh 5 muttered as she hit her alarm clock.

"Abigail! You better get up soon!" came the voice of her father, Mr. Lincoln. "You know you got that test today with the pencils and the paper and the books and, you know what I mean."

"Oh all right," Numbuh 5 muttered as she got herself out of bed to start her morning ritual of taking a shower, pretending to brush her teeth, and putting on a little bit of light makeup. She look a look at herself in the mirror and saw the sleepies under her eyes. Man, that Numbuh 1 and his late night missions. They are ruining my sleeping routine. Then she saw something strange. "Cree! Get over here!"

She then heard some footsteps and the door opening. "What do you want Crabigail?"

"Cree, did you do something to my moisturizer?"

"What are you talking about?" Cree asked as she walked up, holding a hand behind her back.

Numbuh 5 lifted her hair from her forehead, revealing a very prominent uni-brow. "I did not have this when I went to bed last night."

Cree...
11.title: Operation: W.O.L.F.

choices: That Numbuh 5's teeth looked very different
Just some minor swelling- Sore Throat-like in apperance
Nothing unusual, except some stronger bad breath
111.content:
"I know I didn't do that," Cree said as she got on her knees to take a closer look.

"What about your friends?" Numbuh 5 said, as she glared at her sister. "And what's in your hand?"

"I was just talking to Maurice," Cree said as she revealed a cellphone. "And I haven't heard of anything that had to deal with hair." She then stood up and got something from one of the drawers.

"What are getting?" Numbuh 5 asked, crossing her arms.

"A pair of tweezers," Cree said. "I'm going to take a sample and send it to the teens, with the explanation that I found it on a brat that I managed to defeat easily. They'll run tests on it to figure out the cause."

"And then they'll weaponize it and use it on every kid out there," Numbuh 5 said with a growl, which startled Cree.

"No, I'll destroy the research after they formulate an antidote and get it to you," Cree said. "Of course, you'd best not let dad see your uni-brow. Knowing him, he'll give you a full-body waxing, and you'll be balder than Baldy."

"You'd better be careful when you talk about Numbuh 1," Numbuh 5 said with a deeper growl.

"Let me check your throat," Cree said, getting out a small flashlight. "You know how carried away dad gets, like when your skunk friend sprayed me and dad had my sweat glands removed."

"He he, hard to forget that," Numbuh 5 said. She then opened her mouth, and let Cree take a look.

Cree found
111.title: Becomes concerned.

choices: "Not Again!" (She thinks she's turning into a weredog.)
"Let's make sure dad doesn't find out." (Dad's a little over-reactive.)
"It's not just my eyebrow and teeth!" (Something else has changed.)
1111.content:
"Alright," Cree said a minute later. "I think that your permanent teeth came in during the night, or at least the canines did."

Numbuh 5 looked in the mirror again, and checked her mouth- they were more like fangs than normal teeth.

"Oh no," she said as she checked out the rest of her reflection.
1111.title: That Numbuh 5's teeth looked very different

choices: Fortunately, Numbuh 5's transformation stops just around the waist area.
Unfortunately, something else happens in the process.
11111.content:
Upon first glance at her own reflection, all that Numbuh 5 could say out of her own reaction was, "Oh no. Not Again!" From seeing her sister's reaction to her own slowly altering physique, Cree began to show signs of concern out of her own sibling instincts, despite the clear fact that she and Numbuh 5 were enemies.

"Um...Abigail? You okay there?" Cree asked, cautiously approaching her younger sibling, unsure on what was happening at the moment. But suddenly, Numbuh 5 snapped at her older sibling, showing off signs of animalistic behavior, as she growled, "Of course I'm not okay, Sis! I'm turning back into a Were-Dog!"

"Seriously? A Were-Dog?" Cree scoffed, cocking an eyebrow while putting her hands on her hips, obviously thinking that Numbuh 5 was making up some sort of excuse for what was happening to her. However, unlike her younger sibling, Cree hasn't encountered something such as the infamous Were-Dog curse before, despite being familiar with the concept of Werewolves from numerous monster movies.

"*canine-like growl* I'm not joking around, Cree! My teacher, Mrs. Thompson, was turned into a Were-Dog by some stupid curse. She managed to turn several other kids, including Valerie, into Were-Dogs. Heck, she even turned me into a Were-Dog just so she and her fellow mutts would eat my friends' homework! Dang it, I thought that Numbuh 4 and I stopped that curse!" Numbuh 5 replied, letting out an angry dog-like growl when Cree didn't believe what she was saying.

Then, all of a sudden, Numbuh 5 felt a sudden surge of pain, causing her to scream and grunt in pain, as she fell onto her knees. Forced to watch the events unfold before her very eyes, Cree could only watch in shock and disbelief, as she saw her little sister's body go through another transformation, where Abigail's feet grew and change to look like the same feet she had in her Were-Dog form, tearing through her shoes with ease.

From there, light brown fur began to sprout from Numbuh 5's canine feet, as the KND operative's lower body slowly but surely began to look more like her Were-Dog form, sprouting a tail in the process. However, from Cree's perspective, as much as she wanted the KND to fail, the teenager could see that her younger sister actually was right; Numbuh 5 was turning into a Were-Dog.
11111.title: Trip Down Memory Lane

choices: Numbuh 5 jumps outside, in search of the cursed necklace.
Numbuh 5 jumps outside, in search of more people to curse.
111112.content:
The changes didn't stop at Numbuh 5's waist. They progressed further as she spasmed and groaned in pain. Her fingers fused together as her nails turned into claws. Her face pushes out into a canine snout as her nose turns upwards, gaining a dark pebbled texture and her teeth turn into fangs. The fur spread across her body as her clothes ripped apart.

*Dog Howl and Snarl towards Cree*
111112.title: Numbuh 5 is a weredog once again.

choices: The Bus Driver (A man who seems to be slightly over fifty)
12.content:
Frigid
Erratic
Birthday
Really
Urgifies
Agent’s
Retirement
Years

Numbuh 1 was sitting at the computer, taking a look at Father's mansion. "It seems that Father has installed some new rooms," he said. "I must find a way inside to find out what they are for."

*Thwap!*

"Hey, what was that for?" he shouted, as he put one hand on the back of his head, feeling something cold. He pulled it away, and took a look at the object, which was a pure white- "A Snowball! You've got to be kidding me!" he shouted as he turned his head, to find his team wearing winter outfits, all of them holding onto a snowball.

"Come on Numbuh 1," Numbuh 5 said, as she tossed hers up and down. "It's not often we get a snow day, let alone two of them. Now, I'm going to give you to then count of ten to get your big butt off that chair, and into some winter clothes, or me and the others will pelt you good."

"Guys! Father's busy renovating his mansion! For all we know he could be-"

"One-"

"Two-"

"Double-You-

"Four-"

"Okay I'm going!" Numbuh 1 said as he got out of chair.

Just then, static came on the computer. "Attention Kids Next Door Sector V!"

"Phew," Numbur 1 said as he wiped sweet from his forehead. "A mission. On screen!"

Numbuh 86's face showed up. "Numbuh 1! We have an assignment for you and your team. You are to-"

"We'll take it!" Numbuh 1 said with delight. "Anything to help out the Kids Next Door!"

"He'll do anything to get out of doing something fun," Numbuh 5 muttered.

"Even taking a mission from Numbuh 86," Numbuh 4 said in agreement.

"Alright," Numbuh 86 said. "Here is the mission: You are to go to the home of Squad February 29's leader and bring him to Moon-Base for Decommissioning. Today is his thirteenth birthday."

"Understood Sir-Madam-Sir!"

"Just get going you good-for-nothing boy!" The screen turned off.

"You heard her team!" Numbuh 1 said as he went towards the changing rooms. "Let's suit up."

"I've never heard of Squad February 29," Numbuh 2 said. "Have you Numbuh 5?"

"Yeah, and they are very secretive," Numbuh 5 said. "They aren't the most trusted of KND operatives."

"Why's that?" Numbuh 3 asked. "Do they have something against Rainbow Monkeys or something?"

"It has to do with their birthday," Numbuh 5 said. "Their previous leader saved me once when I was starting out and he was a nice, um, boy. However, his birthday was that day, so, he had to be decommissioned."

"So, what about the current leader?" Numbuh 4 asked. "What's he like?"

"Actually, you see him on the bus every day," Numbuh 5 said.

"What do you mean? I have't seen many other operatives on the bus."

"I'm sorry, but his identity is a secret."

About thirty minutes later, Sector V were at the house, which had a yellow locomotive in the driveway.

"Hey, ain't that our bus?" Numbuh 4 asked.

"Yep," Numbuh 5 said slowly.

"I guess the person we're looking for is related to our bus driver some how."

"Yep."

"Alright teem," Numbuh 1 said. "Let's quit talking and get on with the mission. Numbuh 3, open that door. I'll take point. The rest of you follow."

Numbuh 3 skipped up to the door and rang the doorbell. The door opened to reveal...
12.title: Operation: F.E.B.R.U.A.R.Y.

choices: But I've got some information, and you'll need me.
But You're not going to get me that easily!
121.content:
"Why, what are you kids doing here?" the old man said. "Did you come to cheer me up on my day off from taking you to school?"

"Out of our way gramps," Numbuh 4 said as he tried to push him aside. "We've got a mission to do."

"Oh, you're playing a game of hide-and-seek with your friends," the man said as he stepped aside, which caused Numbuh 4 to slip across the floor. "Um, take off your boots please, I just cleaned the floor."

The others then came charging in, though Numbuh 5 stood at the door.

"Alright team," Numbuh 1 shouted. "Let's split up and find that teenager!"

The team then scattered.

"So, how are you doing Mr. Richardson?" Numbuh 5 asked as she looked up at the bus driver.

"You can call me Charles in private you know," the old man said with a chuckle. "I'm guessing that they don't know the truth about me, or the rest of the squad."

"Not at all," Numbuh 5 said with a sigh. "You do know what today is."

Charles chuckled. "Been a long time coming. Been part of the organization well over forty years. Lots of good times."

"You know what has to be done."

"Yes.....
121.title: A Secret Revealed

choices: Number 1 and Number 362 swap and Number 60 and Number 86 swap
Number 86 and Number 362 swap and Number 60 and Number 1 swap
Number 60 and Number 362 swap and Number 1 and Number 86 swap
13.content:
Swapping
With
Impaired
Technology
Creates
Havoc

The KND was lined up outside of Father's mansion, waiting for their supreme leader, number 362, to give the order to charge and stop whatever it was that Father was planning.

Recently, Father and the DCFDTL were stealing a lot of advanced technology from anywhere they could. So, this could only mean that he is planning something that can't be good for the KND.

So, number 362 called in her best sectors and special-op forces in order to stop his plan before it could begin.

And with a simple nod, the children charged, attacking any enemy they saw.

Number 362, or Rachel, was leading the assault.

After breaking into the mansion, she quickly, yet quietly, ran to the basement, as Father's laughter was emanating from there.

Number 362 pushed herself against a wall in order to minimize the likelihood that Father would see her, and looked back to see the small number of handpicked operatives that she chose to follow her in, among them were Number's 1, 86, and 60.

"Well, well, well...what do we have here? A couple of snot-nosed brats spying on me! Well, you'll make wonderful test subjects for my new delightfulization ray, a portable version of my delightfulization machine."

Rachel yelled, "Kids next door, battle stations!"

The four children leapt up and attacked Father.

Father was trying to avoid using his fire powers as that could melt his delightfulization ray since it was in his hand, but it was getting irritating that every time he was able to aim at one of the kids, the child either dodged or another one distracted him.

Eventually, his irritation got the best of him, "THAT'S IT!"

Father went up in flames, and melted his delightfulization ray.

Unfortunately, the ray was fueled by Father's flames, a failsafe so that no one but the inventor could use it, and the resulting overload made the ray blow up.

Everyone was knocked back and with the exception of Father, was unconscious.

Father rubbed his head, "Annoying brats, I need my rocky road now. But first, I think I'll eliminate these pests!"

Before Father could make do on his word, the KND swarmed into the basement, and upon seeing their fellow operatives unconscious, they attacked Father with previously unknown vigor.

But not all of the operatives were attacking, some were helping move the unconscious operatives away from the mansion and into a KND hospital.

(This is a body swapping story, so who switches with who?)
13.title: Operation: S.W.I.T.C.H.

15.content:
Scanning for more missions

Scanning...

Missions found
15.title: Mission 5+

choices: He rallies the other Sector V members.
There’s specific orders for Sector V...?!
151.content:
Biological
Uniting
Invincible
Lifers &
Demons

———-THE DOCUMENTYOU ARE READING IS FOR YOUR EYES ONLY. SHARING THIS DOCUMENT WITHOUT THE SOOPREME COMANDER’S EXCPICT PERMISSION WILL MARK YOU AS A TRAITOR.
I’M SORRY, BUT THE FILES OF THIS DOCUMENT ARE THAT IMPORTANT.————

Operatives,
If you are reading this, then you have been chosen for a mission that, depending on how it goes, will shape the fate of the world for people of all ages.

Serveal years ago in Japan, a mysterious gas-like substance spread throughout Tokyo, and drove adults and children alike into a frenzy. While the KND was able to handle it with some help where the adults couldn’t(to the credit of Japanese Cops, they were effective in rounding up the calmed down people), it wasn’t just a simple supervillan plot. It was a odd occurrence, and our scientists set out to investigate it. They found out that the, for lack of a better term, gas, could be reproduced and purified into two things: a clean energy of sorts, and a super tough yet flexible material. This material and clean energy are used in all of our bases, and in [REDACTED].


We were fools to think we were the only ones to discover this.

Recently, it has come to our attention that group of evil adults called FAUST is aware of this gas, and is exploiting it for a much more sinister purpose: creating an army of Super Soldiers, referee to in their files as Kamen Riders. (Note: Kamen is Japanese for Masked) These Kamen Riders are immensely strong, more so then even an whole Squad of KND operatives, and have super-human level skills and powers. Worse, they are exploiting and harming children, teens and adults in their goals, and not every one of them makes it out alive. The horrible news, is that they are very very close to success. They already have several prototype Riders in use as field operatives, or ranking commanders. They’ve gone after our squads in their local areas. They’ve struck a deal with NAMBA Industrial Technology and Machines to mass produce the finished Kamen Riders, and plan to sell specificly designed Kamen Riders to the highest bidders. And they’ve even got hands in the adult government to prevent and restrict them from interfering with FAUST.

In essence, FAUST are warmongers, looking to revolutionise modern war, and place themselves at the top of the world while doing so. And they are very close to success If these Kamen Riders end up finished and massed produced, we will have a World War 4 that I doubt anything short of Recommising Grandfather will end, at least without significant causites.

WE CANNOT LET FAUST COMPLETE THEIR KAMEN RIDER PROJECT.

Your mission, operatives, is to uttlerly destroy FAUST and all of it’s work, and all it’s ever stood for. Every base and lab must blown to bits, buried in enough rubble that adults won’t even go near it. NAMBA’s hand in this evil pie must be chopped off as well. Every single web that the spider of FAUST has spun must be burnt to ashes and the spider crushed beneath the boot of justice. For the sake of the Earth, children and all the innocent Teens and Adults, FAUST must be wiped off the map.

You can’t back out of this. Failure of this mission will mean the destruction of everything you know and love. Report the Moon Base by 0530 hours. Failure to do so will mean your decommissioning.

SOOPREME COMMANDER
—————————————

Nigel Uno grimmanced. Today was going to be a long, painful day.
151.title: Operation B.U.I.L.D

info.brief_description: Whoever Had Amazing Thought Is Fantastic (Make your own KND Mission) 2,140+Views
info.description:
Attention!

Please insert genetic material (booger) into the computer module to verify identification!

Verifying!

Greetings Kids Next Door Operative.

Please make sure that anyone thirteen and older is out of the room.

Vicinity Clear.

Operative, here are the basics of your mission:

1. Make sure that world is safe from Adult Tyranny.

2. Help any kid who is in need.

3. Make sure that Adults do not discover location of Secret Moon-base Headquarters.

4. Eat only the recommended foods. This includes candy, cake, soda, ice cream, and other sugary foods. Do not eat the unrecomended foods, which include onions, liver, asparagus, and a few other things.

5. Remember, not every Adult is evil. In fact, some make useful, if unknowing and dimwitted, allies, as they are able to transport Operatives to mission destinations. Most Adults think that the KND is just a club of some sort, if they know anything of it. However, there are those who know otherwise. Examples of Evil Adults include Father, Mr. Boss, Crazy Old Cat Lady, Knightbrace, Count Spankulot, Fizz, and Ice Cream Men.

Here are some more rules:

1. I expect you to write your reports with the best spelling and grammar you can do. I know very well that most of you can write better than Numbuh 4 can. HE has the WORST spelling I have EVER seen, and I have run this place for (Goes off on a tangent about how Numbuh 4’s reports are the worst ever in the whole history of bad reports.)

2. Try to use an acronym that sort of sums up the Operation.
Example: W.H.A.T.I.F.
Whoever
Had
Amazing
Thought
Is
Fantastic
(Of course, if an acronym can’t be thought up, use a mission title that tells what’s going on.)

3. Thanks to our safety devices, about the most damage you should receive from enemies are really big booboos, though full-body casts are not unheard of. Other injuries may occur of course, including getting Chickenpox, turned into the opposite gender, turned into animals, agified, zombified, being put under the curse that your teacher was placed under, getting spanked by Count Spankulot, and a few other things.

4. Be on the lookout for KND operatives who are 13 or older who have not been Decommissioned, and had their memory erased. These Teenagers are a serious threat to kids everywhere, as they know our secrets. Capture is a must.

Now, here are some of the Operatives you could encounter on your missions:

Sector V

Numbuh 1: Aka, Nigel Uno. Leader of Sector V. Bald-headed, due to something that the Delightful Children From Down The Lane did to him, along with a bad haircut from his father. Is British-American. Can be paranoid at times, and has a habit of disregarding orders from his superiors, especially Numbuh 86’s. Always tries to make sure his team is safe, and will do whatever it takes to help out other kids, even at the cost of having a personal life. His girlfriend, Lizzie Devine, often wishes that he’d spend some time with her, instead of on KND duties. An only child, his father was once Numbuh 0, the first KND operative and creator of the organization (he has since long been decommissioned, though he was on two occasions briefly recommissioned). It was also recently discovered that Father is his uncle, and the Delightful Children From Down The Lane are his adoptive cousins (who were once KND operatives who were zapped by a delightfulizing device.)

Numbuh 2: Aka, Hoagie P Gilligan. Team inventor and pilot. Chubby and has a habit of cracking puns, much to the annoyance of some of his teammates. Is interested in food much of the time, and is capable of taking Gramma Stuffum’s food, which is highly unusual and disgusting, head on. Is very intelligent. Has something of a crush on Cree, Number 5’s older, and evil, sister. Has a younger brother named Tommy, (Who was once an Operative, Numbuh T, but quit in order to save the whole KND from one of Father’s attacks, and is now known as “The Tommy.”)

Numbuh 3: Aka, Kuki Sanban. Japanese. Is very girly-girly. Has a large collection of Rainbow Monkeys, and is very knowledgeable of them. Is very friendly, but she can be very scary when she is angry (Turns into something like an oni (demon) and everyone runs away.) Has a younger sister who is cuter than her, but very cruel (She once transferred Count Spankulot’s powers into a Rainbow Monkey to get revenge on Numbuh 2 for getting her grounded for life.) Has something of a crush on Numbuh 4.

Numbuh 4: Aka, Wallabee Beatles. Australian. Not the smartest tool in the shed. Has the WORST spelling and handwriting ever. Does poorly in every subject, except anything related to sports and fighting. Can be something of a bully at times, trying to force the others to do things his way when Numbuh 1 is not around. Has trouble swimming, to say the least (he can’t swim and is afraid of the pool, though he did get over this fear to save his friends from their evil versions from an alternative universe.) He does not like anything girly-girly, though he does have a crush on Numbuh 3, but he has trouble explaining it. He also happens to be unlucky at times, such as when he snuck into the theater to see an R-movie, only to find out that it was a meeting for evil Adults.

Numbuh 5: Aka, Abigail Lincoln. Intelligent and laidback tomboy. Is of African American and French descent (Her mother only speaks in French, whenever she shows up. Her father sounds similar to Bill Cosby.) Is the Second-in-Command of Sector V. Tends to talk in the third person, saying things like, “Numbuh 5 says we should just walk on in and ask for some ice cream.” Is able to keep her head even in stressful situations, for the most part. Has an older evil sister named Cree, who was once a KND operative, whom Numbuh 5 looked up to. Was once put under a curse to become a were-poodle, and eat other kids’ homework, but thanks to Numbuh 4 (and his bad homework) she was able to free herself of it. She is also something of a Candy Hunter, and will go on grand adventures to acquire it.

Now, you’d best get going.

Oh, one more thing:

Kids Next Door- BATTLE STATIONS!

Of course, for more information, check out
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kids_Next_Door
http://knd.wikia.com/wiki/Main_Page
